amendment.description: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit Kentucky to operate a separate retirement system for certain public employees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 87 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 87 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S1411-1412; text: CR S1411) To amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit Kentucky to operate a separate retirement system for certain public employees.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 87 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 87 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McConnell.
